name: monsterarena
summary:
This is an endless arena based games.
Experience the new realm of dancing monsters but beware!
as they are dangerous .

Enjoy the new adventurous action based shooting monster Arena virtual reality game on your meta headset.

Create a high score and enjoy the ultimate experience .
This game based on an endless never ending scenario where you can kill and shoot monsters as long as your life runs out.

Beware!
These monsters are sloppy they fire baby monsters which hold mines underneath themselves and do...
